summary: A drama based on the true-life experiences of four combat photographers capturing the final days of apartheid in South Africa.
cast: Ryan Phillippe|Malin Akerman|Taylor Kitsch|Neels van Jaarsveld|Frank Rautenbach|Nina Milner|Jessica Haines|Lika Berning|Kgosi Mongake|Russel Savadier|Patrick Shai|Alfred Kumalo|Craig Palm|Nick Boraine|Patrick Lyster|Khutso Shilakwe|Vusi Kunene|Julian Rademeyer|Darren Kelfkens|Andy Stead|Greg Melvill-Smith|David Butler|Adrian Waldron|Geoffery Sekele|Kate Mbele|John Hogg|Israel Matseke-Zulu|Fiona Ramsay|Ashley Mulheron|Neil Tabatznik|Jacques Gombault|Ashley Saunders|Eloiise Horjus|Katlego Bingwa|Nats Ramabulawna|Mtunzi Mtoyi|Gabisile Ndebele|Nadia Neophotou|Rethabile Ramaphakela|Zodwa Tshabalala|Sandile Mvunyiswa|Nomanzo Muyaka|Siyamthanda Ndlanga|Jabulani Mthembu|Siphiwe Zulu|Sibusiso Khambule|Mzi Khumalo|Nancy Buirski|Nelson Mandela
title: The Bang Bang Club
